item.description:
BBQ @ the Giant! Expect the usual crowd. There will be food but plan on bringing something. You can join the IRC channel (#scosug on Freenode) to discuss. Grill should be hot by 1pm and ready for food. Sleeping Giant is kid and dog friendly with lots of hiking trails.

Join the IRC to get various cell phones to confirm location/timing if you are trying to find us! Or email me or Al Gordon.

Â 

Nick
item.how_to_find_us: Look for geeks and at least one inflatable penguin. I will try to get the pavilion but no promises there.

group.name: Southern CT Open Source Users Group (SCOSUG)

item.name: barbecue!
